name: jenkins
description: Jenkins MCP server for managing jobs, builds, and artifacts

tools.name: jenkins_list_jobs
tools.description: List all Jenkins jobs with their names and URLs

tools.name: jenkins_search_jobs
tools.description: Search for Jenkins jobs by name (case-insensitive substring match)

tools.name: jenkins_get_job_status
tools.description: Get the status of the last build for a specific job

tools.name: jenkins_get_build_status
tools.description: Get detailed status of a specific build number for a job

tools.name: jenkins_get_recent_builds
tools.description: Get recent builds for a job with their status and metadata

tools.name: jenkins_get_console_log
tools.description: Get console log output from a build

tools.name: jenkins_trigger_build
tools.description: Trigger a new build for a job, optionally with parameters

tools.name: jenkins_list_artifacts
tools.description: List all artifacts produced by a specific build

tools.name: jenkins_get_artifact
tools.description: Download a specific artifact from a build (returns base64-encoded content)
